original: HULTMAN, Karin Margit, Fru, Malmö, f Mmö 26/8 99 av grosshandl C J Salinder o Emma Rqsvall, gm sparv.dir Einar A Hultman, Mmö. Högre fisk, Maltestorps help f flickor, Särö, samt språkst i Frankr. Vkst dir o styr.led i Salinder & Co AB, Mmö, sed. 41. Ag fastigh Sånekulla n:r 8, Mmö. Resor: Europ länder uppr ggr utom Port, Balkan o Ryssl.
translated: HULTMAN, Karin Margit, Mrs., Malmö, born in Malmö on August 26, 1899, to the merchant C J Salinder and Emma Rqsvall. Married to the railway director Einar A Hultman in Malmö. Completed higher education in fisheries and worked at Maltestorp assisting girls, Särö, as well as language studies in France. Developed as a director and served on the board of Salinder & Co AB, Malmö, since 1941. Owns property at Sånekulla No. 8, Malmö. Traveled extensively in European countries several times, excluding Portugal, the Balkans, and Russia.

travelHistory.name: Europe
travelHistory.description: Traveled extensively in European countries several times, excluding Portugal, the Balkans, and Russia.
